document_data.caption: A branch from the tree
document_data.name: Myrrh tree
document_data.mainbody: '''Myrrh trees''' were type of [[:Category:Trees|tree]], notable for their use in making [[myrrh]].
document_data.Description: The tree resembled a squat, thorny bush.
document_data.Availability:
Myrrh trees grew among [[frankincense]] and [[dragons' blood]] plants along streams that flowed from the [[Desertsmouth Mountains]] into the desert, generally along the eastern and northeastern edges of [[the Sword]], as well as in the westward hills verging the [[Plain of Standing Stones]].

The [[D'tarig]] harvested some myrrh, but the vast majority was handled by [[Bedine]] people who sold it in exchange for metalwork. Along with frankincense, [[cassia]], and dragons' blood, myrrh was one of the luxury exports of the region.
